data: It was not generally known among his acquaintances that Marston Loring had come back from Africa accompanied by a new friend; this new friend was not introduced by Loring at either of his clubs, and yet the two met at least once every day.

A Valiant Ignorance; vol. 3 of 3
A Novel in Three Volumes
